title: Authors and Citation
text: Tatsuya Shima. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Shima T (2024). glaredb: R Bindings 'GlareDB'. R package version 0.0.1.9000, https://github.com/eitsupi/r-glaredb.
code: @Manual{,   title = {glaredb: R Bindings for 'GlareDB'},   author = {Tatsuya Shima},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.1.9000},   url = {https://github.com/eitsupi/r-glaredb}, }

title: R Bindings for GlareDB
text: Check GlareDB repo learn .

title: R Bindings for GlareDB
text: package can installed R-universe. available, binary package installed. Currently, Windows supported. Please use WSL2.

title: R Bindings for GlareDB
text: Use GlareDB directly R query analyzer variety data sources, including arrow::Table polars::RPolarsDataFrame.
code: library(glaredb) library(polars)  df <- pl$DataFrame(   A = 1:5,   fruits = c("banana", "banana", "apple", "apple", "banana"),   B = 5:1,   C = c("beetle", "audi", "beetle", "beetle", "beetle") )  df2 <- glaredb_sql("select * from df where fruits = 'banana'") |>   as_polars_df()  df2 #> shape: (3, 4) #> ┌─────┬────────┬─────┬────────┐ #> │ A   ┆ fruits ┆ B   ┆ C      │ #> │ --- ┆ ---    ┆ --- ┆ ---    │ #> │ i32 ┆ str    ┆ i32 ┆ str    │ #> ╞═════╪════════╪═════╪════════╡ #> │ 1   ┆ banana ┆ 5   ┆ beetle │ #> │ 2   ┆ banana ┆ 4   ┆ audi   │ #> │ 5   ┆ banana ┆ 1   ┆ beetle │ #> └─────┴────────┴─────┴────────┘

title: Create a GlareDB table — as_glaredb_table
text: class struct similar arrow::Table innerly can converted classes via nanoarrow::as_nanoarrow_array_stream().

title: Create a GlareDB table — as_glaredb_table
code: as_glaredb_table(x, ...)  # S3 method for default as_glaredb_table(x, ..., schema = NULL)  # S3 method for nanoarrow_array_stream as_glaredb_table(x, ...)  # S3 method for RGlareDbExecutionOutput as_glaredb_table(x, ...)

title: Create a GlareDB table — as_glaredb_table
text: x object coerced GlareDB table. ... Additional arguments passed methods. schema optional schema used enforce conversion particular type. Defaults infer_nanoarrow_schema().

title: Create a GlareDB table — as_glaredb_table
text: GlareDB table.

title: Create a GlareDB table — as_glaredb_table
code: con <- glaredb_connect()  # Create a GlareDB table from a data frame with a specified schema dat <- data.frame(a = 1:3, b = letters[1:3]) |>   as_glaredb_table(     schema = nanoarrow::na_struct(       list(         a = nanoarrow::na_int64(),         b = nanoarrow::na_large_string()       )     )   )  # Run an SQL query against the connection, # and convert the result to a GlareDB table glaredb_sql("SELECT * FROM dat", con) |>   as_glaredb_table() #> ┌───────┬───────────┐ #> │     a │ b         │ #> │    ── │ ──        │ #> │ Int64 │ LargeUtf8 │ #> ╞═══════╪═══════════╡ #> │     1 │ a         │ #> │     2 │ b         │ #> │     3 │ c         │ #> └───────┴───────────┘  # Convert the GlareDB table to an arrow Table if (requireNamespace("arrow", quietly = TRUE)) {   dat |>     arrow::as_arrow_table() } #> Table #> 3 rows x 2 columns #> $a <int64> #> $b <large_string>  # Convert the GlareDB table to a polars DataFrame if (requireNamespace("polars", quietly = TRUE)) {   dat |>     polars::as_polars_df() } #> shape: (3, 2) #> ┌─────┬─────┐ #> │ a   ┆ b   │ #> │ --- ┆ --- │ #> │ i64 ┆ str │ #> ╞═════╪═════╡ #> │ 1   ┆ a   │ #> │ 2   ┆ b   │ #> │ 3   ┆ c   │ #> └─────┴─────┘

title: glaredb: R Bindings for 'GlareDB' — glaredb-package
text: R bindings 'GlareDB', analytical database based 'Apache Arrow' 'Apache DataFusion' can connect various data sources execute queries.

title: glaredb: R Bindings for 'GlareDB' — glaredb-package
text: Maintainer: Tatsuya Shima ts1s1andn@gmail.com

what: Connect to a GlareDB database — glaredb_connect
title: Connect to a GlareDB database — glaredb_connect
text: Connect GlareDB database

title: Connect to a GlareDB database — glaredb_connect
code: glaredb_connect(   data_dir_or_cloud_url = NULL,   ...,   spill_path = NULL,   disable_tls = FALSE,   cloud_addr = "https://console.glaredb.com",   location = NULL,   env = parent.frame() )

title: Connect to a GlareDB database — glaredb_connect
text: data_dir_or_cloud_url character path local GlareDB database cloud URL NULL. NULL, -memory database used. ... Ignored. spill_path TODO disable_tls TRUE FALSE indicating whether disable TLS. cloud_addr character GlareDB cloud URL. location TODO env TODO

title: Connect to a GlareDB database — glaredb_connect
text: GlareDB connection object

title: Connect to a GlareDB database — glaredb_connect
code: con <- glaredb_connect()  con$sql("SELECT 'hello from R' as hello") |>   as.data.frame() #>          hello #> 1 hello from R

what: Run a query against a GlareDB database — glaredb_sql
title: Run a query against a GlareDB database — glaredb_sql
text: Run query GlareDB database

title: Run a query against a GlareDB database — glaredb_sql
code: glaredb_sql(query, connection = NULL)  glaredb_prql(query, connection = NULL)  glaredb_execute(query, connection = NULL)

title: Run a query against a GlareDB database — glaredb_sql
text: query character query run. glaredb_sql glaredb_execute, SQL query. glaredb_prql, PRQL query. connection GlareDB connection object NULL. NULL, default -memory database used.

title: Run a query against a GlareDB database — glaredb_sql
text: GlareDB execusion output. glaredb_execute, value returned invisibly.

title: Run a query against a GlareDB database — glaredb_sql
code: glaredb_sql("SELECT 'hello from R' as hello") |>   as_glaredb_table() #> ┌──────────────┐ #> │ hello        │ #> │ ──           │ #> │ Utf8         │ #> ╞══════════════╡ #> │ hello from R │ #> └──────────────┘  glaredb_prql("from [   {a=5, b=false},   {a=6, b=true}, ]") |>   as_glaredb_table() #> ┌───────┬─────────┐ #> │     a │ b       │ #> │    ── │ ──      │ #> │ Int64 │ Boolean │ #> ╞═══════╪═════════╡ #> │     5 │ false   │ #> │     6 │ true    │ #> └───────┴─────────┘  glaredb_execute("CREATE TABLE my_table (a int)") glaredb_execute("INSERT INTO my_table VALUES (1), (2)") glaredb_sql("SELECT * FROM my_table") |>   as_glaredb_table() #> ┌───────┐ #> │     a │ #> │    ── │ #> │ Int32 │ #> ╞═══════╡ #> │     1 │ #> │     2 │ #> └───────┘

title: glaredb 0.0.1
text: Experimental initial release.

title: glaredb 0.0.1
text: Can’t install Windows. Can’t cross-compilation arm64 Linux. pre-built libraries available amd64 Linux, arm64 macOS, amd64 macOS. Documentation work progress.
